topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Required Patches

body.p: Occasionally, you will be asked to deploy a patch to your running HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade environment.
All patch files can be downloaded from the Software Updates & Licensing site. You must obtain a HPE Passport user account and a Service Agreement ID (SAID) in order to download these files.

Some patches must be installed prior to deploying yout cloud and some patches must be installed after the cloud is fully installed and running. Consult the following table for the patches you need to apply and when they must be applied.

section.title: Post-deployment patches
section.p: If your HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade cloud is fully deployed, you must install the following patches based on your cloud topology, unless you have installed them during installation. The following table shows the patches that need to be installed, the name of the download file, and which deployments need the patch.
Some patches can be deployed during the installation. If you installed a patch during installation, you do not need to install the patch again.

section.title: KVM Region Patches
section.p: The following patches are to be applied to the servers in the KVM region. You should have installed KVM Region Patch 1 and KVM Region Patch 2 during installation.
Some patches can be deployed during the installation. If you installed a patch during installation, you do not need to install the patch again.

body.section:
Launch the the Software Updates and Licensing site
To downloaded the patches, launch the Software Updates & Licensing site. You must obtain a Service Agreement ID (SAID) in order to download these files. In a browser, navigate to the Software Updates & Licensing site.
Click Sign In to log in using your account.
After signing in, enter your Service Agreement ID (SAID) in the Software updates and licensing page and accept the license agreement.
Click View Available Products to access the list of products associated with your SAID.
Under Infrastructure Management, click Get software updates.
On the product list page, locate the product version and then click Get Softwarecorresponding to it.

section.title: Download the patch
section.p: To download the patch you need from the Software Updates and Licensing site, shown above:

ol.li: Select the required patch file from the Downloads list and click Download to continue.

As required, you can select any of the specified download methods:
Use HPE Download Manager. Click the Use the HPE Download Manager link to specify where the installation package will be saved.
Use Standard Download. Click the Download link to use the standard download method for your browser.
Use the download cart. Click the Add to download cart to select several files to download at once.
